data.title: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII “Hope Summary Video”
data.meta_description: Gaming news, reviews, previews, and coverage from around the world focused around Square Enix
data.text:
We’ve had Lightning, Snow, and now Hope is getting the summary video treatment from Square Enix Japan.

Having traveled with Lightning during the events of FFXIII and aiding her sister in XIII-2, Hope has mysteriously reverted to the form of a child in Lightning Returns. From the Ark, Hope will guide Lightning through her journey as the world’s Savior – instructing her on the ways of Nova Chrysalia as well as giving her a place to rest when the day is done.

The video is in Japanese, but those familiar with the events of the previous two titles should be able to at least glean some sort of understanding from it.
